cfg

Class InDirCallInst

  • java.lang.Object
    • cfg.TACInst
      • cfg.CallInst
        • cfg.InDirCallInst

  • public class InDirCallInst
extends CallInst
    A class representing a three-address code indirect call instruction (InDirCallInst). An indirect call instruction consists of a target variable holding the address to jump to (inherited from CallInst), an optional destination variable to assign the result of the call to (inherited from CallInst), and the number of parameters (ref. and standard) used by the call (inherited from CallInst). From TACInst it also inherits an opcode (INDIRCALL).
    Author:
    Marc Corliss and Lori Pietraszek
